title: Ranked Disabled on a Public Holiday?????
body:
Riot disables ranked queues with only 1.5hr notice, on the evening of a public holiday. Why not do it at 3am when barely anyone is playing considering works back tomorrow?

And 0 explanation as to why this couldn't wait? What a joke.

replies.body: Seems back online now. Would still like an explanation as to what exactly the reasoning to this was?......
I'd love an update considering it's still down :(

Given its not regular scheduled maintenance, it seems likely it's an emergency maintenance type situation. Naturally, it happens with any online game from time to time.

As for why no explanation, could be they expect to have it fixed fast and feel it's more worthwhile to put everyone's effort into fixing it, rather than having to write out and distribute an explanation (which seems likely given they have a timeframe in the service status). 

Sometime's it's that they don't *have* an explanation beyond "shit's broken" and want to have something better than that before updating if possible.
